DFHXQS2D.text:
000100***********************************************************
000200*                                                         *
000300* CONTROL BLOCK NAME = DFHXQS2D                           *
000400*                                                         *
000500* NAME OF MATCHING PLS CONTROL BLOCK = None               *
000600*                                                         *
000700* DESCRIPTIVE NAME = CICS                                 *
000800*              (XQ) Statistics for queue buffer pool.     *
000900*                                                         *
001000*            @BANNER_START@                               *
001100*            Licensed Materials - Property of IBM         *
001200*                                                         *
001300*            "Restricted Materials of IBM"                *
001400*                                                         *
001500*            5655-147                                     *
001600*                                                         *
001700*            (C) Copyright IBM Corp. 1995, 1996           *
001800*                                                         *
001900*            CICS 5.3.0                                   *
002000*            (Element of CICS Transaction Server          *
002100*              Version 1 Release 3)                       *
002200*            @BANNER_END@                                 *
002300*                                                         *
002400* STATUS = 5.1.0                                          *
002500*                                                         *
002600* FUNCTION = XQ                                           *
002700*      Statistics for queue index buffer pool usage.      *
002800*                                                         *
002900* LIFETIME = N/A                                          *
003000*                                                         *
003100* STORAGE CLASS = N/A                                     *
003200*                                                         *
003300* LOCATION = N/A                                          *
003400*  N/A                                                    *
003500*                                                         *
003600* NOTES :                                                 *
003700*  DEPENDENCIES = S/370                                   *
003800*  MODULE TYPE = Control block definition                 *
003900*  PROCESSOR = Assembler                                  *
004000*                                                         *
004100*---------------------------------------------------------*
004200*                                                         *
004300* CHANGE ACTIVITY :                                       *
004400*  $SEG(DFHXQS2D),COMP(XQ),PROD(CICS    ):                *
004500*                                                         *
004600*  PN= REASON REL YYMMDD HDXXIII : REMARKS                *
004700*  $L0= 692 510 950327 HDBNJAS : New for TS Datasharing   *
004800*                                                         *
004900***********************************************************
005000*$ ALTHOUGH PROVIDED IN A GENERAL INTERFACE LIBRARY,      *
005100*$ DFHXQS2D IS NOT TO BE USED AS A GENERAL PROGRAMMING    *
005200*$ INTERFACE. REFER TO PRODUCT DOCUMENTATION TO DETERMINE *
005300*$ INTENDED USAGE                                         *
005400***********************************************************
005500* XQ buffer pool statistics record
005600 01  DFHXQS2D.
005700* Start of record
005800     02  S2.
005900* Length of data area
006000         03  S2LEN PIC S9(4) COMP.
006300* XQ buffer pool stats id
006400         03  S2ID PIC S9(4) COMP.
006410* XQ buffer pool stats mask
006420             88  S2IDE VALUE 0122.
006700* XQ buffer pool version number
006800     02  S2DVERS PIC S9(2) COMP.
006810* DSECT version number mask
006820         88  S2VERS VALUE 01.
006900* Reserved
007000     02  FILLER PIC X(3).
007100***********************************************************
007200* These statistics are for the queue index buffer pool,   *
007300* which is used to read and write queue index entries     *
007400* plus the associated data if the total queue size does   *
007500* not exceed 32K bytes. Buffers containing recently       *
007600* accessed queue index entries are added to a least       *
007700* recently used chain, which means that if another request*
007800* for the same queue arrives shortly afterwards, it may   *
007900* possible to optimize the processing based on the        *
008000* assumption that the copy in the buffer is probably      *
008100* already correct. If all other buffers are in used, a    *
008200* request for a new buffer will discard the contents of   *
008300* the least recently used buffer and reuse the storage as*
008400* a free buffer.                                          *
008500*                                                         *
008600* These statistics are returned by AXM buffer management  *
008700* interface. The queue server does not use some of the    *
008800* AXM buffer management functions (such as KEEP or PURGE) *
008900* so those counters will be zero. *                       *
009000***********************************************************
009100
009200***********************************************************
009300* These fields describe the current state of the buffer   *
009400* pool.                                                   *
009500***********************************************************
009600* Total buffers defined
009700     02  S2BFQTY PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
009800* Number of buffers used so far
009900     02  S2BFENTH PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
010000* Active buffers owned by tasks
010100     02  S2BFACTS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
010200* Valid buffers on LRU chain
010300     02  S2BFLRUS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
010400* Empty buffers on free chain
010500     02  S2BFEMPS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
010600***********************************************************
010700* The following counters start again from zero after a    *
010800* reset.                                                  *
010900***********************************************************
011000* Waits on buffer pool lock
011100     02  S2BFPWTS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
011200* GET requests
011300     02  S2BFGETS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
011400* GET which found a valid buffer
011500     02  S2BFHITS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
011600* GETs which used a free buffer
011700     02  S2BFGFRS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
011800* GETs which used a new buffer
011900     02  S2BFGNWS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
012000* GETs which used the LRU buffer
012100     02  S2BFGLRS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
012200* GET waits on buffer lock
012300     02  S2BFLWTS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
012400* GETs which returned no buffer
012500     02  S2BFGNBS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
012600* PUTs (put back buffer as valid)
012700     02  S2BFPUTS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
012800* KEEPs (put back buffer as modified)
012900     02  S2BFKEPS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
013000* FREEs (put back buffer as empty)
013100     02  S2BFFRES PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
013200* FREE errors, buffer not owned
013300     02  S2BFFNOS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
013400* PURGEs (mark buffer invalid)
013500     02  S2BFPURS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
013600* PURGE with no matching buffer found
013700     02  S2BFPNFS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.
013800* PURGE errors, buffer not owned
013900     02  S2BFPNOS PIC S9(8) COMP VALUE 0.

DFHXQS3D.text:
000100***********************************************************
000200*                                                         *
000300* CONTROL BLOCK NAME = DFHXQS3D                           *
000400*                                                         *
000500* NAME OF MATCHING PLS CONTROL BLOCK = None               *
000600*                                                         *
000700* DESCRIPTIVE NAME = CICS                                 *
000800*              (XQ) Statistics for server storage.        *
000900*                                                         *
001000*            @BANNER_START@                               *
001100*            Licensed Materials - Property of IBM         *
001200*                                                         *
001300*            "Restricted Materials of IBM"                *
001400*                                                         *
001500*            5655-147                                     *
001600*                                                         *
001700*            (C) Copyright IBM Corp. 1995, 1996           *
001800*                                                         *
001900*            CICS 5.3.0                                   *
002000*            (Element of CICS Transaction Server          *
002100*              Version 1 Release 3)                       *
002200*            @BANNER_END@                                 *
002300*                                                         *
002400* STATUS = 5.1.0                                          *
002500*                                                         *
002600* FUNCTION = XQ Statistics for server main storage usage. *
002700*                                                         *
002800* LIFETIME = N/A                                          *
002900*                                                         *
003000* STORAGE CLASS = N/A                                     *
003100*                                                         *
003200* LOCATION = N/A                                          *
003300*  N/A                                                    *
003400*                                                         *
003500* NOTES :                                                 *
003600* DEPENDENCIES = S/370                                    *
003700* MODULE TYPE = Control block definition                  *
003800* PROCESSOR = Assembler                                   *
003900*                                                         *
004000*---------------------------------------------------------*
004100*                                                         *
004200* CHANGE ACTIVITY :                                       *
004300*  $SEG(DFHXQS3D),COMP(XQ),PROD(CICS    ):                *
004400*                                                         *
004500* PN= REASON REL YYMMDD HDXXIII : REMARKS                 *
004600* $L0= 692 510 950327 HDBNJAS : New for TS Datasharing    *
004700*                                                         *
004800***********************************************************
004900*$ ALTHOUGH PROVIDED IN A GENERAL INTERFACE LIBRARY,      *
005000*$ DFHXQS3D IS NOT TO BE USED AS A GENERAL PROGRAMMING    *
005100*$ INTERFACE. REFER TO PRODUCT DOCUMENTATION TO DETERMINE *
005200*$ INTENDED USAGE.                                        *
005300***********************************************************
005400* XQ main storage statistics record
005500 01  DFHXQS3D.
005600* Start of record
005700     02  S3.
005800* Length of data area
005900         03  S3LEN PIC S9(4) COMP.
006200* XQ main storage stats id
006300         03  S3ID PIC S9(4) COMP.
006310* XQ main storage stats mask
006320             88  S3IDE VALUE 0123.
006600* XQ main storage stats version
006700     02  S3DVERS PIC S9(2) COMP.
006710* DSECT version number mask
006720         88  S3VERS VALUE 01.
006800* Reserved
006900     02  FILLER PIC X(3).
007000
007100***********************************************************
007200* These are the statistics returned by the AXM page pool  *
007300* management routines for the pools AXMPGANY and AXMPGLOW.*
007400* Storage in these pools is allocated in multiples of 4K  *
007500* pages on a 4K boundary. The most frequent use is for    *
007600* segments of LIFO stack storage.                         *
007700*                                                         *
007800* Storage is initially allocated from the pool using a    *
007900* bit map.For faster allocation, free areas are not       *
008000* normally returned to the pool but are added to a vector *
008100* of free chains depending on the size of the free area   *
008200* (1 to 32 pages). When storage is being acquired, this   *
008300* vector is checked before going to the pool bit map.     *
008400*                                                         *
008500* If there are no free areas of the right size and there  *
008600* is not enough storage left in the pool, free areas in   *
008700* the vector are put back into the pool, starting from    *
008800* the smallest end, until a large enough area has been    *
008900* created. This action appears as a compress attempt in   *
009000* the statistics. If there is still insufficient storage  *
009100* to satisfy the request, the request is failed.          *
009200***********************************************************
009300
009400***********************************************************
009500* Statistics for LOC=ANY storage pool.                    *
009600***********************************************************
009700* Pool name AXMPGANY
009800     02  S3ANYNAM PIC X(8).
009900* Size of storage pool area
010000     02  S3ANYSIZ PIC S9(8) COMP.
010100* Address of storage pool area
010200     02  S3ANYPTR PIC S9(8) COMP.
010300* Total pages in the storage pool
010400     02  S3ANYMX PIC S9(8) COMP.
010500* Number of used pages in the pool
010600     02  S3ANYUS PIC S9(8) COMP.
010700* Number of free pages in the pool
010800     02  S3ANYFR PIC S9(8) COMP.
010900* Lowest free pages (since reset)
011000     02  S3ANYLO PIC S9(8) COMP.
011100* Storage GET requests
011200     02  S3ANYRQG PIC S9(8) COMP.
011300* Gets which failed to obtain storage
011400     02  S3ANYRQF PIC S9(8) COMP.
011500* Storage FREE requests
011600     02  S3ANYRQS PIC S9(8) COMP.
011700* Compress (defragmentation) attempts
011800     02  S3ANYRQC PIC S9(8) COMP.
011900***********************************************************
012000* Statistics for LOC=BELOW storage pool.                  *
012100***********************************************************
012200* Pool name AXMPGLOW
012300     02  S3LOWNAM PIC X(8).
012400* Size of storage pool area
012500     02  S3LOWSIZ PIC S9(8) COMP.
012600* Address of storage pool area
012700     02  S3LOWPTR PIC S9(8) COMP.
012800* Total pages in the storage pool
012900     02  S3LOWMX PIC S9(8) COMP.
013000* Number of used pages in the pool
013100     02  S3LOWUS PIC S9(8) COMP.
013200* Number of free pages in the pool
013300     02  S3LOWFR PIC S9(8) COMP.
013400* Lowest free pages (since reset)
013500     02  S3LOWLO PIC S9(8) COMP.
013600* Storage GET requests
013700     02  S3LOWRQG PIC S9(8) COMP.
013800* Gets which failed to obtain storage
013900     02  S3LOWRQF PIC S9(8) COMP.
014000* Storage FREE requests
014100     02  S3LOWRQS PIC S9(8) COMP.
014200* Compress (defragmentation) attempts
014300     02  S3LOWRQC PIC S9(8) COMP.

G207DCAN.text:
***********************************************************************
*        G207DCAN -- DATE CONVERSION SUBPROGRAM                       *
*        STANDARD PARAMETER FORMAT                                    *
* (COBOL) CALL 'G207DCAN' USING FUNC-CODE, INPUT-DATE, OUTPUT-DATE    *
*                                                                     *
* FUNCTION CODES AVAILABLE FOR DATE CONVERSIONS                       *
*                                                                     *
*  01 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN CALENDAR FORMAT     - MM/DD/YY       *
*  02 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN COMPRESSED FORMAT   - MMDDYY         *
*  03 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN JULIAN FORMAT       - YYDDD          *
*  04 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN ALPHANUMERIC FORMAT - MAY 31, 1947   *
*  05 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM CALENDAR TO COMPRESSED               *
*  06 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM CALENDAR TO JULIAN                   *
*  07 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM CALENDAR TO ALPHANUMERIC             *
*  08 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM COMPRESSED TO CALENDAR               *
*  09 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM COMPRESSED TO JULIAN                 *
*  10 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM JULIAN TO CALENDAR                   *
*  11 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO COMPRESSED                        *
*  12 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO ALPHANUMERIC                      *
*  13 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO DAY OF WEEK                       *
*  14 - RETRIEVE DATE IN CENTURY CALENDAR            - MM/DD/YYYY     *
*  15 - RETRIEVE DATE IN CENTURY JULIAN              - YYYYDDD        *
*  16 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO CALENDAR                  *
*  17 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM CALENDAR TO JULIAN                  *
*  18 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO ALPHANUMERIC              *
*  19 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM CALENDAR TO ALPHANUMERIC            *
*  20 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO DAY OF WEEK               *
*  21 - CONVERT DATE FROM CALENDAR TO CENTURY CALENDAR                *
*  22 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO CENTURY JULIAN                    *
*  23 - CONVERT DATE FROM CALENDAR TO CENTURY JULIAN                  *
*  24 - CONVERT DATE FROM COMPRESSED TO CENTURY JULIAN                *
*  25 - CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO JULIAN                    *
*  26 - CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO CALENDAR                  *
*  27 - CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO COMPRESSED                *
*  28 - CONVERT CALENDAR TO DAY OF WEEK                               *
*  29 - CONVERT COMPRESSED TO DAY OF WEEK                             *
*  30 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO DAY OF WEEK                       *
*  31 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO CALENDAR                          *
*  32 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO COMPRESSED                        *
*  33 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO JULIAN                            *
*  34 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO CENTURY CALENDAR                  *
*  35 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO CENTURY CALENDAR               *
*  36 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO CENTURY JULIAN                 *
*  37 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO ALPHANUMERIC                   *
*  38 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO DAY OF WEEK                    *
*                                                                     *
*        FIELD FORMATS                                                *
*  FUNCTION   INPUT PARAMETER        LENGTH  OUTPUT PARAMETER LENGTH  *
*  01         MM/DD/YY     (OUTPUT)    08    NOT USED                 *
*  02         MMDDYY       (OUTPUT)    06    NOT USED                 *
*  03         YYDDD        (OUTPUT)    05    NOT USED                 *
*  04         MAY 16, 1962 (OUTPUT)    19    NOT USED                 *
*  05         MM/DD/YY                 08    MMDDYY             06    *
*  06         MM/DD/YY                 08    YYDDD              05    *
*  07         MM/DD/YY                 19    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  08         MMDDYY                   06    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  09         MMDDYY                   06    YYDDD              05    *
*  10         YYDDD                    05    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  11         YYDDD                    05    MMDDYY             06    *
*  12         YYDDD                    05    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  13         YYDDD                    05    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  14         MM/DD/YYYY   (OUTPUT)    10    NOT USED                 *
*  15         YYYYDDD      (OUTPUT)    07    NOT USED                 *
*  16         YYYYDDD                  07    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  17         MM/DD/YYYY               10    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  18         YYYYDDD                  07    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  19         MM/DD/YYYY               10    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  20         YYYYDDD                  07    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  21         MM/DD/YY                 08    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  22         YYDDD                    05    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  23         MM/DD/YY                 08    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  24         MMDDYY                   06    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  25         YYYYDDD                  07    YYDDD              05    *
*  26         YYYYDDD                  07    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  27         YYYYDDD                  07    MMDDYY             06    *
*  28         MM/DD/YY                 08    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  29         MMDDYY                   06    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  30         MM/DD/YYYY               10    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  31         MM/DD/YYYY               10    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  32         MM/DD/YYYY               10    MMDDYY             06    *
*  33         MM/DD/YYYY               10    YYDDD              05    *
*  34         YYDDD                    05    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  35         XXXXXXXX                 08    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  36         XXXXXXXX                 08    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  37         XXXXXXXX                 10    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  38         XXXXXXXX                 07    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*                                                                     *
*  IF THE FIRST PARAMETER IS PASSED AS A PACKED DECIMAL 7 DIGIT FIELD *
*  RATHER THAN A TWO CHARACTER FUNCTION CODE THE CALCULATION ROUTINES *
*  WILL BE ENTERED AND SUMS AND DIFFERENCES OF JULIAN DATES ARE       *
*  CALCULATED.  IF PARAMETER 1 IS ZERO PARAMETER 2 WILL BE SUBTRACTED *
*  FROM PARAMETER 3 AND THE RESULT WILL BE PLACED IN PARAMETER 1 AS A *
*  SIGNED NUMBER OF DAYS DIFFERENCE.  IF PARAMETER 1 IS NOT ZERO THEN *
*  IT WILL BE ADDED TO PARAMETER 2 AND THE RESULT PLACED IN PARAMETER *
*  3 AS A JULIAN DATE. PARAMETER 2 AND PARAMETER 3 ARE ASSUMED TO BE  *
*  7 CHARACTERS IN LENGTH SUITABLE FOR JULIAN DATES IN CENTURY FORMAT *
*                                                                     *
*  DATE FORMATS:                                                      *
*  1.  MM/DD/YY            CALENDAR                                   *
*  2.  MMDDYY              COMPRESSED                                 *
*  3.  YYDDD               JULIAN                                     *
*  4.  MONTH DAY, YEAR     ALPHANUMERIC                               *
*  5.  DAY OF WEEK         1WEEKDAY                                   *
*  6.  MM/DD/YYYY          EXTENDED CALENDAR                          *
*  7.  YYYYDDD             EXTENDED JULIAN                            *
*  8.  XXXXXXXX            TOD CLOCK FORMAT                           *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************
G207DCAN AMODE 31
G207DCAN RMODE ANY
G207DCAN CSECT
STRTHRE  STM  14,12,12(13)
         USING STRTHRE,15
         LA    9,SJULIAN
         ST    13,4(9)
         ST    9,8(13)
         BAL   13,PGMBEGIN
SJULIAN  DS    18F
         DC    CL8'G207DCAN'
PGMBEGIN L     3,0(1)
         TM    0(3),X'F0'
         BNO   CALCRTN
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'01'
         BL    NOFUN
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'38'
         BH    NOFUN
         L     4,4(1)
         L     5,8(1)
         MVC   DATEIN,0(4)
         MVC   DATEOUT,DATEIN
         PACK  DBLWRD,0(2,3)
         CVB   6,DBLWRD
         SLA   6,2
BRNCHTAB B     *(6)
F01      B     CV70
F02      B     CV70
F03      B     CV70
F04      B     CV70
F05      B     CV12
F06      B     CV16
F07      B     CV16
F08      B     CV21
F09      B     CV21
F10      B     CV37
F11      B     CV37
F12      B     CV37
F13      B     CV37
F14      B     CV70
F15      B     CV70
F16      B     CV76
F17      B     CV67
F18      B     CV76
F19      B     CV64
F20      B     CV75
F21      B     CV16
F22      B     CV37
F23      B     CV16
F24      B     CV21
F25      B     CV73
F26      B     CV76
F27      B     CV76
F28      B     CV16
F29      B     CV21
F30      B     CV67
F31      B     CV61
F32      B     CV61
F33      B     CV67
F34      B     CV37
F35      B     CV80
F36      B     CV80
F37      B     CV80
F38      B     CV80
NOFUN    DC    H'0'
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN CENTURY JULIAN FORMAT            *
*  USING CURRENT CPU TOD CLOCK SETTING AS STARTING POINT     *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 01 02 03 04 14 15                              *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV70     EQU   *
         LR    8,15
         STCK  TODCLCK
         LR    15,8
         MVC   TSVTS,TODCLCK
         L     8,16
         L     8,X'130'(,8)
         AL    8,TSVTS
         ST    8,TSVTS
         B     CV70A
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CPU TOD CLOCK SETTING TO CENTURY JULIAN FORMAT    *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 35 36 37 38                                    *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV80     EQU   *
         MVC   TSVTS,DATEIN
CV70A    EQU   *
         ZAP   TSJULIAN,=P'1900'
         CLC   TSVTS,X4YEAR
         BL    CK1YEAR
         LA    7,X4YEAR
         BAL   8,SUBTRACT
         AP    TSJULIAN,=P'4'
CK4MORE  CLC   TSVTS,X4YEARS           ..4 MORE YEARS?
         BL    CKLEAPSW                ....NO,  GO CHECK FOR LEAP YEAR
         AP    TSJULIAN,=P'4'
         LA    7,X4YEARS
         BAL   8,SUBTRACT              SUBTRACT
         B     CK4MORE
CKLEAPSW CLC   TSVTS,X366DAYS          DATE OTHER THAN LEAP YEAR?
         BL    CALCDAYS
         AP    TSJULIAN,=P'1'          ..YES, ADD LEAP YEAR
         LA    7,X366DAYS
         BAL   8,SUBTRACT              SUBTRACT
CK1YEAR  CLC   TSVTS,X365DAYS         ANY MORE NON-LEAP YEARS LEFT?
         BL    CALCDAYS
         AP    TSJULIAN,=P'1'         ..YES, ADD NORMAL YEAR
         LA    7,X365DAYS
         BAL   8,SUBTRACT              SUBTRACT
         B     CK1YEAR
CALCDAYS SRP   TSJULIAN,3,0            CHANGE 0YYYY TO YYYYJJJ
         AP    TSJULIAN,=P'1'          SET TO FIRST DAY IN YEAR
CK1DAY   CLC   TSVTS,X1DAY             ONE MORE DAY REMAINING?
         BL    ENDDATE                 ..NO, GOT THE DATE
         AP    TSJULIAN,=P'1'
         LA    7,X1DAY
         BAL   8,SUBTRACT              SUBTRACT
         B     CK1DAY
ENDDATE  UNPK  JDATE(7),TSJULIAN
         OI    JDATE+L'JDATE-1,X'F0'
         MVC   DATEOUT(7),JDATE
         MVC   DATEIN(7),DATEOUT
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'03'
         BL    CV76
         BE    CV73
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'04'
         BE    CV76
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'14'
         BE    CV76
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'35'
         BE    CV76
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'37'
         BE    CV76
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'38'
         BE    CV75
         LA    11,6
         B     OUT
SUBTRACT L     9,TSVTS+4
         SL    9,4(7)                  SET CONDITION CODE
         ST    9,TSVTS+4
         L     9,TSVTS
         BNM   NOBORROW                BRANCH ON NO BORROW
         BCTR  9,0                     SUBTRACT BORROWED BIT
NOBORROW SL    9,0(7)
         ST    9,TSVTS
         BR    8
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT DATE FROM CALENDAR TO CENTURY CALENDAR            *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 06 07 21 23 28                                 *
*             09 24 29                                       *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV16     EQU   *
         MVC   DATEOUT(6),DATEIN
         MVC   DATEOUT+8(2),DATEIN+6
         CLI   DATEIN+6,C'5'
         BL    CV16A
         MVC   DATEOUT+6(2),=C'19'
         B     CV16B
CV16A    MVC   DATEOUT+6(2),=C'20'
CV16B    MVC   DATEIN(10),DATEOUT
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'06'
         BE    CV67
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'07'
         BE    CV64
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'09'
         BE    CV67
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'23'
         BE    CV67
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'24'
         BE    CV67
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'28'
         BE    CV67
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'29'
         BE    CV67
         LA    11,9
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO CENTURY JULIAN                *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 10 11 12 13 22 34                              *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV37     EQU   *
         MVC   DATEOUT+2(5),DATEIN
         CLI   DATEIN,C'5'
         BL    CV37A
         MVC   DATEOUT(2),=C'19'
         B     CV37B
CV37A    MVC   DATEOUT(2),=C'20'
CV37B    MVC   DATEIN(7),DATEOUT
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'34'
         BE    CV76
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'13'
         BL    CV76
         BE    CV75
         LA    11,6
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO JULIAN                *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 25                                             *
*             03 33                                          *
*             06                                             *
*             09                                             *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV73     EQU   *
         MVC   DATEOUT(5),DATEIN+2
         MVC   DATEIN(5),DATEOUT
         LA    11,4
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO CALENDAR              *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 16 18 26 27                                    *
*             01 02 04 10 11 12 14 34 35 37                  *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV76     EQU   *
         MVC   JDATE,DATEIN
         STM   0,5,ZQSAV
         PACK  DBLWRD,JDATE+0(4)
         CVB   5,DBLWRD
         PACK  DBLWRD,JDATE+4(3)
         CVB   1,DBLWRD
         LA    2,ZQTAB
         LA    3,12
         NI    ZQFND01+3,0
         C     5,=F'1900'
         BE    ZQLOP01
         C     5,=F'1800'
         BE    ZQLOP01
         C     5,=F'1700'
         BE    ZQLOP01
         N     5,=F'3'
         BC    4,ZQLOP01
         CH    1,=H'60'
         BL    ZQLOP01
         BH    *+8
         OI    ZQFND01+3,1
         BCT   1,ZQLOP01
ZQLOP01  SLA   3,1
         CH    1,0(3,2)
         BH    ZQFND01
         SRA   3,1
         BCT   3,ZQLOP01
         MVI   DBLWRD,X'F0'
         MVC   DBLWRD+1(7),DBLWRD
         B     ZQOUT
ZQFND01  LA    1,0(1)
         SH    1,0(3,2)
         SRA   3,1
         MH    3,=H'1000'
         AR    3,1
         CVD   3,DBLWRD
         UNPK  DBLWRD(5),DBLWRD+5(3)
         OI    DBLWRD+4,X'F0'
         MVC   DBLWRD+2(2),DBLWRD+3
         MVC   DBLWRD+4(4),JDATE
ZQOUT    MVC   DATEOUT(2),DBLWRD
         MVC   DATEOUT+3(2),DBLWRD+2
         MVC   DATEOUT+6(4),DBLWRD+4
         MVI   DATEOUT+2,C'/'
         MVI   DATEOUT+5,C'/'
         MVC   DATEIN(10),DATEOUT
         LM    0,5,ZQSAV
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'04'
         BL    CV61
         BE    CV64
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'12'
         BL    CV61
         BE    CV64
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'18'
         BE    CV64
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'26'
         BE    CV61
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'27'
         BE    CV61
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'37'
         BE    CV64
         LA    11,9
         B     OUT
ZQSAV    DS    6F
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM CALENDAR TO JULIAN              *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 17 30 33                                       *
*             06 23 28                                       *
*             09 24 29                                       *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV67     EQU   *
         LA    2,DATEIN
         PACK  DBLWRD,0(2,2)
         CVB   6,DBLWRD
         SLA   6,1
         LA    6,ZQTAB(6)
         PACK  DBLWRD,3(2,2)
         CVB   7,DBLWRD
         AH    7,0(6)
         PACK  DBLWRD,6(4,2)
         CVB   6,DBLWRD
         C     6,=F'1900'
         BE    NOLEAP1
         C     6,=F'1800'
         BE    NOLEAP1
         C     6,=F'1700'
         BE    NOLEAP1
         N     6,=F'3'
         BC    4,NOLEAP1
         CLC   0(2,2),=C'03'
         BL    NOLEAP1
         LA    7,1(7)
NOLEAP1  CVD   7,DBLWRD
         UNPK  DATEOUT+4(3),DBLWRD+6(2)
         OI    DATEOUT+6,X'F0'
         MVC   DATEOUT(4),6(2)
         MVC   DATEIN(7),DATEOUT
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'06'
         BE    CV73
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'09'
         BE    CV73
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'28'
         BE    CV75
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'29'
         BE    CV75
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'30'
         BE    CV75
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'33'
         BE    CV73
         LA    11,6
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO CALENDAR                      *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 31 32                                          *
*             01 02 26 27                                    *
*             04 10 11                                       *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV61     EQU   *
         MVC   DATEOUT+6(2),DATEOUT+8
         MVC   DATEIN(8),DATEOUT
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'02'
         BE    CV12
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'32'
         BE    CV12
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'11'
         BE    CV12
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'27'
         BE    CV12
         LA    11,7
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CALENDAR TO COMPRESSED CALENDAR                   *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 05                                             *
*             02 32                                          *
*             27                                             *
*             11                                             *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV12     EQU   *
         MVC   DATEOUT(2),DATEIN
         MVC   DATEOUT+2(2),DATEIN+3
         MVC   DATEOUT+4(2),DATEIN+6
         LA    11,5
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM CALENDAR TO ALPHANUMERIC        *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 19                                             *
*             07 18                                          *
*             04 12 37                                       *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV64     EQU   *
         LA    6,DATEOUT
         LA    7,MOTABLE
         MVI   0(6),X'40'
         MVC   1(18,6),0(6)
TEST     CLC   0(2,7),DATEIN
         BE    MVNAM
         LA    7,11(0,7)
         B     TEST
MVNAM    MVC   0(9,6),2(7)
TESTA    LA    6,1(0,6)
         CLI   0(6),X'40'
         BNE   TESTA
         MVC   1(2,6),DATEIN+3
         MVI   3(6),C','
         CLI   DATEIN+8,X'40'
         BH    CV64C
         CLI   DATEIN+6,C'5'
         BL    CV64A
         MVC   4(2,6),=C'19'
         B     CV64B
CV64A    MVC   4(2,6),=C'20'
CV64B    MVC   6(2,6),DATEIN+6
         B     CV64D
CV64C    MVC   4(4,6),DATEIN+6
CV64D    LA    11,18
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT COMPRESSED CALENDAR TO CALENDAR                   *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 08 09 24 29                                    *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV21     EQU   *
         MVC   DATEOUT(8),=C'  /  /  '
         MVC   DATEOUT(2),DATEIN
         MVC   DATEOUT+3(2),DATEIN+2
         MVC   DATEOUT+6(2),DATEIN+4
         MVC   DATEIN,DATEOUT
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'09'
         BE    CV16
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'24'
         BE    CV16
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'29'
         BE    CV16
         LA    11,7
         B     OUT
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO DAY OF WEEK           *
*                                                            *
*  FUNCTIONS: 20                                             *
*             13 30 38                                       *
*             28                                             *
*             29                                             *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CV75     EQU   *
         ZAP   RESULT,ZEROS
         LA    10,BASEDATE
         LA    11,DATEIN
         LA    12,RESULT
         OI    RETURN+1,X'F0'
         STM   14,12,12(13)
         BAL   7,ENT2
         NI    SW,0
         LM    14,12,12(13)
         NI    RETURN+1,X'0F'
         DP    RESULT,SEVEN
         ZAP   DBLWRD,RESULT+3(1)
         CVB   2,DBLWRD
         C     2,=F'0'
         BNL   *+8
         LA    2,7(2)
         MH    2,=H'10'
         LA    2,DAYTABLE(2)
         MVC   DATEOUT(10),0(2)
         LA    11,9
         B     OUT
OUT      EQU   *
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'05'
         BL    MOVEEX
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'14'
         BE    MOVEEX
         CLC   0(2,3),=C'15'
         BE    MOVEEX
         OI    MOVEDAT+2,X'10'
MOVEEX   EX    11,MOVEDAT
         NI    MOVEDAT+2,X'EF'
         L     13,4(13)
         LM    14,12,12(13)
         SR    15,15
         BR    14
MOVEDAT  MVC   0(0,4),DATEOUT
*********************************************************************
*                                                                   *
*     TABLES, STORAGE, AND CONSTANTS                                *
*                                                                   *
*********************************************************************
MOTABLE  DC    C'01JANUARY  '
         DC    C'02FEBRUARY '
         DC    C'03MARCH    '
         DC    C'04APRIL    '
         DC    C'05MAY      '
         DC    C'06JUNE     '
         DC    C'07JULY     '
         DC    C'08AUGUST   '
         DC    C'09SEPTEMBER'
         DC    C'10OCTOBER  '
         DC    C'11NOVEMBER '
         DC    C'12DECEMBER '
DAYTABLE DC    C'1SUNDAY   '
         DC    C'2MONDAY   '
         DC    C'3TUESDAY  '
         DC    C'4WEDNESDAY'
         DC    C'5THURSDAY '
         DC    C'6FRIDAY   '
         DC    C'7SATURDAY '
ZQTAB    DC    F'0'
         DC    H'31'
         DC    H'59'
         DC    H'90'
         DC    H'120'
         DC    H'151'
         DC    H'181'
         DC    H'212'
         DC    H'243'
         DC    H'273'
         DC    H'304'
ZQE      DC    H'334'
TODCLCK  DS    D
TSVTS    DS    D
DBLWRD   DC    D'0'
X4YEARS  DC    X'072CE4E26E000000' 1,461 DAYS, NO. OF DAYS INC LEAP YR
X4YEAR   DC    X'072BA304F8000000' 1,460 DAYS, NO. OF DAYS
X366DAYS DC    X'01CC2A9EB4000000' LEAP YEAR
X365DAYS DC    X'01CAE8C13E000000' NORMAL YEAR
X1DAY    DC    X'000141DD76000000' ONE DAY
X1HOUR   DC    X'00000D693A400000' ONE HOUR
X1MINUTE DC    X'0000003938700000' ONE MINUTE
X1SECOND DC    X'00000000F4240000' ONE SECOND
X1MILSEC DC    X'00000000003E8000' ONE MILLISECOND
X1MICSEC DC    X'0000000000001000' ONE MICROSECOND
ZEROS    DC    PL4'0'
TSJULIAN DS    PL4
RESULT   DC    PL4'0'
TSLEAP   DS    CL1
SEVEN    DC    PL1'7'
BASEDATE DC    CL7'1900063'
JDATE    DS    CL7
DATEIN   DS    CL10
DATEOUT  DS    CL19
SW       DC    X'0'
CALC1    DS    F
CALC2    DS    CL7'0'
CALC3    DS    CL7'0'
         DS    0D
**************************************************************
*                                                            *
*  DATE CALCULATION ROUTINES.  IF THE FIRST ARGUMENT IS ZERO *
*  THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN TWO DATES WILL BE CACLULATED.  IF  *
*  THE FIRST ARGUMENT IS NOT ZERO THEN IT WILL BE ADDED WITH *
*  THE SECOND ARGUMENT AND THE RESULT PLACED INTO THE THIRD  *
*  ARGUMENT.                                                 *
*                                                            *
**************************************************************
CALCRTN  L     10,4(1)
         L     11,8(1)
         L     12,0(1)
ENT2     MVC   CALC1,0(12)
         MVC   CALC2,0(10)
         MVC   CALC3,0(11)
         TM    2(12),X'0C'
         BNO   CV3CB
         MVC   CALC1,ZEROS
         MVI   CALC2,X'F0'
         MVC   CALC2+1(6),CALC2
         MVC   CALC3,CALC2
         MVC   CALC1+1(3),0(12)
         MVC   CALC2+2(5),0(10)
         MVC   CALC3+2(5),0(11)
         CLI   CALC2+2,C'5'
         BL    CV2CA
         MVC   CALC2(2),=C'19'
         B     CV2CB
CV2CA    MVC   CALC2(2),=C'20'
CV2CB    CLI   CALC3+2,C'5'
         BL    CV3CA
         MVC   CALC3(2),=C'19'
         B     CV3CB
CV3CA    MVC   CALC3(2),=C'20'
CV3CB    CP    CALC1,ZEROS
         BNE   FINDDATE
         CLC   CALC2,CALC3
         BE    RETURN
         XR    8,8
         XR    9,9
         PACK  DBLWRD,CALC2(4)
         CVB   2,DBLWRD
         PACK  DBLWRD,CALC3(4)
         CVB   3,DBLWRD
COMPYR   CR    2,3
         BE    SAMEYR
         BL    CKLEAP
         OI    SW,1
         XR    2,3
         XR    3,2
         XR    2,3
CKLEAP   LR    5,2
         C     2,=F'1900'
         BE    NOLEAP2
         C     2,=F'1800'
         BE    NOLEAP2
         C     2,=F'1700'
         BE    NOLEAP2
         N     5,=F'3'
         BC    4,NOLEAP2
         LA    8,1(8)
         B     LEAP
NOLEAP2  LA    9,1(9)
LEAP     LA    2,1(2)
         B     COMPYR
SAMEYR   MH    8,=H'366'
         MH    9,=H'365'
         AR    9,8
         PACK  DBLWRD,CALC2+4(3)
         CVB   2,DBLWRD
         PACK  DBLWRD,CALC3+4(3)
         CVB   3,DBLWRD
         TM    SW,1
         BNO   NORVRS
         XR    2,3
         XR    3,2
         XR    2,3
NORVRS   AR    9,3
         SR    9,2
         TM    SW,1
         BNO   NOTNEG
         LCR   9,9
NOTNEG   CVD   9,DBLWRD
         ZAP   CALC1,DBLWRD+4(4)
RETCALC  TM    2(12),X'0C'
         BNO   RET2
         MVC   0(3,12),CALC1+1
         MVC   0(5,10),CALC2+2
         MVC   0(5,11),CALC3+2
         B     RETURN
RET2     MVC   0(4,12),CALC1
         MVC   0(7,10),CALC2
         MVC   0(7,11),CALC3
RETURN   NOPR  7
         L     13,4(13)
         NI    SW,0
         LM    14,12,12(13)
         SR    15,15
         BR    14
FINDDATE ZAP   DBLWRD,CALC1
         CVB   2,DBLWRD
         PACK  DBLWRD,CALC2(4)
         CVB   3,DBLWRD
         PACK  DBLWRD,CALC2+4(3)
         CVB   4,DBLWRD
         AR    4,2
         LTR   2,2
         BZ    SAMDAY
         BP    POSIT
         BCT   3,NEGAT
POSIT    LCR   3,3
         B     DIFFYR
NEGAT    LTR   4,4
         BC    12,DIFFYR
         LA    3,1(3)
         B     END
DIFFYR   LPR   4,4
YR       C     4,=F'365'
         BH    INCR
         LTR   3,3
         BM    END
         OI    SW,1
INCR     LR    6,3
         LPR   6,6
         C     6,=F'1900'
         BE    DOWNYR
         C     6,=F'1800'
         BE    DOWNYR
         C     6,=F'1700'
         BE    DOWNYR
         N     6,=F'3'
         BZ    LEAP2
DOWNYR   S     4,=F'365'
         B     NOTLEAP2
LEAP2    C     4,=F'366'
         BE    END
         S     4,=F'366'
NOTLEAP2 C     4,=F'0'
         BE    COUNTYR
         TM    SW,1
         BO    END
COUNTYR  BCT   3,YR
END      LPR   3,3
         LPR   4,4
         CVD   3,DBLWRD
         UNPK  CALC3(5),DBLWRD+5(3)
         MVC   CALC3(4),CALC3+1
         CVD   4,DBLWRD
         UNPK  CALC3+4(3),DBLWRD+6(2)
         OI    CALC3+3,X'F0'
         OI    CALC3+6,X'F0'
         B     RETCALC
SAMDAY   MVC   CALC3,CALC2
         B     RETCALC
         END

G207DOCS.text:
***********************************************************************
*        G207DCAN -- DATE CONVERSION SUBPROGRAM                       *
*        STANDARD PARAMETER FORMAT                                    *
* (COBOL) CALL 'G207DCAN' USING FUNC-CODE, INPUT-DATE, OUTPUT-DATE    *
*                                                                     *
* FUNCTION CODES AVAILABLE FOR DATE CONVERSIONS                       *
*                                                                     *
*  01 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN CALENDAR FORMAT     - MM/DD/YY       *
*  02 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN COMPRESSED FORMAT   - MMDDYY         *
*  03 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN JULIAN FORMAT       - YYDDD          *
*  04 - RETRIEVE CURRENT DATE IN ALPHANUMERIC FORMAT - MAY 31, 1947   *
*  05 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM CALENDAR TO COMPRESSED               *
*  06 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM CALENDAR TO JULIAN                   *
*  07 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM CALENDAR TO ALPHANUMERIC             *
*  08 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM COMPRESSED TO CALENDAR               *
*  09 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM COMPRESSED TO JULIAN                 *
*  10 - CONVERT DATE FORMAT FROM JULIAN TO CALENDAR                   *
*  11 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO COMPRESSED                        *
*  12 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO ALPHANUMERIC                      *
*  13 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO DAY OF WEEK                       *
*  14 - RETRIEVE DATE IN CENTURY CALENDAR            - MM/DD/YYYY     *
*  15 - RETRIEVE DATE IN CENTURY JULIAN              - YYYYDDD        *
*  16 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO CALENDAR                  *
*  17 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM CALENDAR TO JULIAN                  *
*  18 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO ALPHANUMERIC              *
*  19 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM CALENDAR TO ALPHANUMERIC            *
*  20 - CONVERT CENTURY DATE FROM JULIAN TO DAY OF WEEK               *
*  21 - CONVERT DATE FROM CALENDAR TO CENTURY CALENDAR                *
*  22 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO CENTURY JULIAN                    *
*  23 - CONVERT DATE FROM CALENDAR TO CENTURY JULIAN                  *
*  24 - CONVERT DATE FROM COMPRESSED TO CENTURY JULIAN                *
*  25 - CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO JULIAN                    *
*  26 - CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO CALENDAR                  *
*  27 - CONVERT DATE FROM CENTURY JULIAN TO COMPRESSED                *
*  28 - CONVERT CALENDAR TO DAY OF WEEK                               *
*  29 - CONVERT COMPRESSED TO DAY OF WEEK                             *
*  30 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO DAY OF WEEK                       *
*  31 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO CALENDAR                          *
*  32 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO COMPRESSED                        *
*  33 - CONVERT CENTURY CALENDAR TO JULIAN                            *
*  34 - CONVERT DATE FROM JULIAN TO CENTURY CALENDAR                  *
*  35 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO CENTURY CALENDAR               *
*  36 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO CENTURY JULIAN                 *
*  37 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO ALPHANUMERIC                   *
*  38 - CONVERT DATE FROM TOD CLOCK TO DAY OF WEEK                    *
*                                                                     *
*        FIELD FORMATS                                                *
*  FUNCTION   INPUT PARAMETER        LENGTH  OUTPUT PARAMETER LENGTH  *
*  01         MM/DD/YY     (OUTPUT)    08    NOT USED                 *
*  02         MMDDYY       (OUTPUT)    06    NOT USED                 *
*  03         YYDDD        (OUTPUT)    05    NOT USED                 *
*  04         MAY 16, 1962 (OUTPUT)    19    NOT USED                 *
*  05         MM/DD/YY                 08    MMDDYY             06    *
*  06         MM/DD/YY                 08    YYDDD              05    *
*  07         MM/DD/YY                 19    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  08         MMDDYY                   06    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  09         MMDDYY                   06    YYDDD              05    *
*  10         YYDDD                    05    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  11         YYDDD                    05    MMDDYY             06    *
*  12         YYDDD                    05    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  13         YYDDD                    05    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  14         MM/DD/YYYY   (OUTPUT)    10    NOT USED                 *
*  15         YYYYDDD      (OUTPUT)    07    NOT USED                 *
*  16         YYYYDDD                  07    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  17         MM/DD/YYYY               10    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  18         YYYYDDD                  07    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  19         MM/DD/YYYY               10    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  20         YYYYDDD                  07    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  21         MM/DD/YY                 08    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  22         YYDDD                    05    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  23         MM/DD/YY                 08    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  24         MMDDYY                   06    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  25         YYYYDDD                  07    YYDDD              05    *
*  26         YYYYDDD                  07    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  27         YYYYDDD                  07    MMDDYY             06    *
*  28         MM/DD/YY                 08    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  29         MMDDYY                   06    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  30         MM/DD/YYYY               10    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*  31         MM/DD/YYYY               10    MM/DD/YY           08    *
*  32         MM/DD/YYYY               10    MMDDYY             06    *
*  33         MM/DD/YYYY               10    YYDDD              05    *
*  34         YYDDD                    05    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  35         XXXXXXXX                 08    MM/DD/YYYY         10    *
*  36         XXXXXXXX                 08    YYYYDDD            07    *
*  37         XXXXXXXX                 10    MAY 16, 1962       19    *
*  38         XXXXXXXX                 07    4WEDNESDAY         10    *
*                                                                     *
*  IF THE FIRST PARAMETER IS PASSED AS A PACKED DECIMAL 7 DIGIT FIELD *
*  RATHER THAN A TWO CHARACTER FUNCTION CODE THE CALCULATION ROUTINES *
*  WILL BE ENTERED AND SUMS AND DIFFERENCES OF JULIAN DATES ARE       *
*  CALCULATED.  IF PARAMETER 1 IS ZERO PARAMETER 2 WILL BE SUBTRACTED *
*  FROM PARAMETER 3 AND THE RESULT WILL BE PLACED IN PARAMETER 1 AS A *
*  SIGNED NUMBER OF DAYS DIFFERENCE.  IF PARAMETER 1 IS NOT ZERO THEN *
*  IT WILL BE ADDED TO PARAMETER 2 AND THE RESULT PLACED IN PARAMETER *
*  3 AS A JULIAN DATE. PARAMETER 2 AND PARAMETER 3 ARE ASSUMED TO BE  *
*  7 CHARACTERS IN LENGTH SUITABLE FOR JULIAN DATES IN CENTURY FORMAT *
*                                                                     *
*  DATE FORMATS:                                                      *
*  1.  MM/DD/YY            CALENDAR                                   *
*  2.  MMDDYY              COMPRESSED                                 *
*  3.  YYDDD               JULIAN                                     *
*  4.  MONTH DAY, YEAR     ALPHANUMERIC                               *
*  5.  DAY OF WEEK         1WEEKDAY                                   *
*  6.  MM/DD/YYYY          EXTENDED CALENDAR                          *
*  7.  YYYYDDD             EXTENDED JULIAN                            *
*  8.  XXXXXXXX            TOD CLOCK FORMAT                           *
*                                                                     *
***********************************************************************

ICCFMEMB.text:
000100 ID DIVISION.
000200 PROGRAM-ID. ICCFMEMB.
000300 AUTHOR. MATTHEW STITT.
000400 DATE-WRITTEN. 03/09/04.
000500 DATE-COMPILED.
000600 REMARKS.  GET MEMBER FROM ICCF BACKUP TAPE.
000700 ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
000800 CONFIGURATION SECTION.
000900 SOURCE-COMPUTER.  IBM-2066.
001000 OBJECT-COMPUTER.  IBM-2066.
001100 SPECIAL-NAMES.
001200     C01 IS TO-CHAN-1.
001300 INPUT-OUTPUT SECTION.
001400 FILE-CONTROL.
001500     SELECT PARMIN   ASSIGN TO UT-S-SYSIN.
001600     SELECT MEMBER-OUT ASSIGN TO UT-S-ICCFMEM.
001700     SELECT LIST-OUT ASSIGN TO UT-S-SYS007.
001900     SELECT ICCF-INP ASSIGN TO UT-S-ICCFBKP.
002000 DATA DIVISION.
002100 FILE SECTION.
002200 FD  PARMIN
002300     RECORDING MODE IS F
002400     LABEL RECORDS ARE STANDARD
002500     BLOCK CONTAINS 0 RECORDS.
002510*****************************************************************
002520*  PARAMETERS TO BE SET UP ARE FOR INCLUSION OR EXCLUSION OF    *
002530*  CICS SYSTEMS AND/OR RECORD TYPES FOR REPORTING.              *
002540*                                                               *
002550*  COL. 1 - I/E  INCLUDE/EXCLUDE ENTRY                          *
002560*  COL. 2 - L/M  LIBRARY/MEMBER TO UNLOAD                       *
002561*  COL. 3 - EMPTY                                               *
002562*  COL. 4 - LIBRARY NUMBER/MEMBER NAME                          *
002570*                                                               *
002590*****************************************************************
002600 01  PARM-RECORD.
002700     03  PARM-TYPE           PIC X(02).
002800     03  FILLER              PIC X(01).
002900     03  PARM-NAME           PIC X(77).
003000     03  PARM-ARRAY        REDEFINES PARM-NAME.
003100         05  PARM-CHAR   OCCURS 77 TIMES
003200                             PIC X.
003300 FD  ICCF-INP
003400     LABEL RECORDS ARE STANDARD
003500     BLOCK CONTAINS 0 RECORDS
003700     RECORDING MODE IS F.
003800 01  ICCF-BKP-IN.
003900     02  BKP-HEADER          PIC X(2).
004000     02  BKP-LIB-INFO.
004100         03  BKP-LIB-NO      PIC 9(4)  COMP.
004200         03  FILLER          PIC X(6).
004300     02  BKP-MEMB-INFO       REDEFINES BKP-LIB-INFO.
004400         03  BKP-MEM-NAME    PIC X(8).
004410     02  FILLER              PIC X(70).
004420     02  BKP-REC-TYPE        PIC X.
004500 FD  LIST-OUT
004600     RECORDING MODE IS F
004700     LABEL RECORDS ARE OMITTED.
004800 01  PRINT-LINE              PIC X(133).
005300 FD  MEMBER-OUT
005400     LABEL RECORDS ARE STANDARD

       01  SYSDUMP-CMD-TABLE.

               05 FILLER          PIC X(8) VALUE 'FC0002  '.

       COPY DFHAID.
       01  TRANDUMP-CODE-TABLE.
            03 TCT-AVAILABLE-ENTRYS.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'AZI6'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'ATNI'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'AZTS'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'FFFF'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'FFFF'.

               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'FFFF'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'FFFF'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'FFFF'.
               05 FILLER          PIC X(4) VALUE 'FFFF'.
            03 FILLER REDEFINES TCT-AVAILABLE-ENTRYS
               OCCURS 10 TIMES INDEXED BY XTCT.

       01  END-OF-STORAGE              PIC X(26) VALUE
           'MIDP WORKING STORAGE END  '.
       LINKAGE SECTION.
       01  DFHCOMMAREA                 PIC X(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       T000-START.
           EXEC CICS ASKTIME
                     ABSTIME(DATETIME)
                     END-EXEC.
           EXEC CICS FORMATTIME
                     ABSTIME(DATETIME)
                     DATESEP('/') MMDDYY(FORMAT-DATE)
                     TIMESEP      TIME(FORMAT-TIME)
                     END-EXEC.
       T005-SET-VALUES.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(ADD)        TO ACTION-CODE.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(NOSHUTDOWN) TO SHUT-OPTION.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(LOCAL)      TO LOCAL-OPTION.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(NOSYSDUMP)  TO SYSDMP-OPTION.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(NOTRANDUMP) TO TRNDMP-OPTION.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(LOCAL)      TO SYSDMP-DUMPSCOPE.
           MOVE DFHVALUE(DAE)        TO SYSDMP-DAEOPTION.
           SET XSCT TO 1.
       T010-ISSUE-COMMANDS.
           IF XSCT GREATER THAN 10 OR
              SCT-ENTRY (XSCT) EQUAL TO 'FFFFFFFF'
              SET XTCT TO 1
              GO TO T050-ISSUE-DUMP-CODES.
           MOVE SCT-ENTRY (XSCT) TO SYSDMPCMD
                                    FORMATTED-TEXT.
           EXEC CICS SET SYSDUMPCODE(SYSDMPCMD)
                         MAXIMUM(NOLIMIT)
                         ACTION(ACTION-CODE)
                         SHUTOPTION(SHUT-OPTION)
                         SYSDUMPING(SYSDMP-OPTION)
                         DUMPSCOPE(SYSDMP-DUMPSCOPE)
                         DAEOPTION(SYSDMP-DAEOPTION)
                         RESP(CICSRESP)
                         RESP2(CICSRESP2)
                         END-EXEC.
           IF CICSRESP EQUAL TO DFHRESP(NORMAL)
              MOVE MESSAGE-OK-SYS TO FORMATTED-TYPE
              MOVE 0          TO FORMATTED-RESP2
           ELSE
              PERFORM T080-ERROR-RTN THRU
                      T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT
              MOVE CICSRESP2     TO FORMATTED-RESP2
              MOVE MESSAGE-ERROR TO FORMATTED-TYPE.
           IF EIBTRMID EQUAL TO SPACES OR
              EIBTRMID EQUAL TO LOW-VALUES
              GO TO T015-WRITE-QUEUE.
       T010-SEND-MESSAGE.
           EXEC CICS SEND ERASE
                          FROM(BLANK-ENTRY)
                          LENGTH(1)
                          END-EXEC.
       T015-WRITE-QUEUE.
           EXEC CICS WRITEQ TD
                     FROM(FORMATTED-MESSAGE)
                     LENGTH(FORMATTED-LENGTH)
                     QUEUE('CSSL')
                     END-EXEC.
           SET XSCT UP BY 1.
           GO TO T010-ISSUE-COMMANDS.
       T050-ISSUE-DUMP-CODES.
           IF XTCT GREATER THAN 10 OR
              TCT-ENTRY (XTCT) EQUAL TO 'FFFF'
              GO TO T110-END-OF-JOB.
           MOVE TCT-ENTRY (XTCT) TO TRNDMPCODE
                                    FORMATTED-TEXT.
           EXEC CICS SET TRANDUMPCODE(TRNDMPCODE)
                         MAXIMUM(ZERODUMPS)
                         DUMPSCOPE(LOCAL-OPTION)
                         ACTION(ACTION-CODE)
                         SHUTOPTION(SHUT-OPTION)
                         TRANDUMPING(TRNDMP-OPTION)
                         RESP(CICSRESP)
                         RESP2(CICSRESP2)
                         END-EXEC.
           IF CICSRESP EQUAL TO DFHRESP(NORMAL)
              MOVE MESSAGE-OK-TRN TO FORMATTED-TYPE
              MOVE 0          TO FORMATTED-RESP2
           ELSE
              PERFORM T080-ERROR-RTN THRU
                      T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT
              MOVE CICSRESP2     TO FORMATTED-RESP2
              MOVE MESSAGE-ERROR TO FORMATTED-TYPE.
           IF EIBTRMID EQUAL TO SPACES OR
              EIBTRMID EQUAL TO LOW-VALUES
              GO TO T065-WRITE-QUEUE.
       T055-SEND-MESSAGE.
           EXEC CICS SEND ERASE
                          FROM(BLANK-ENTRY)
                          LENGTH(1)
                          END-EXEC.
       T065-WRITE-QUEUE.
           EXEC CICS WRITEQ TD
                     FROM(FORMATTED-MESSAGE)
                     LENGTH(FORMATTED-LENGTH)
                     QUEUE('CSSL')
                     END-EXEC.
           SET XTCT UP BY 1.
           GO TO T050-ISSUE-DUMP-CODES.
       T080-ERROR-RTN.
           IF CICSRESP = DFHRESP(DUPREC)
              MOVE 'DUPREC  : ' TO MESSAGE-TYPE
              GO TO T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
           IF CICSRESP = DFHRESP(INVREQ)
              MOVE 'INVREQ  : ' TO MESSAGE-TYPE
              GO TO T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
           IF CICSRESP = DFHRESP(IOERR)
              MOVE 'IOERR   : ' TO MESSAGE-TYPE
              GO TO T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
           IF CICSRESP = DFHRESP(NOTAUTH)
              MOVE 'NOTAUTH : ' TO MESSAGE-TYPE
              GO TO T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
           IF CICSRESP = DFHRESP(NOTFND)
              MOVE 'NOTFND  : ' TO MESSAGE-TYPE
              GO TO T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
           IF CICSRESP = DFHRESP(NOSPACE)
              MOVE 'NOSPACE : ' TO MESSAGE-TYPE
              GO TO T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
       T080-ERROR-RTN-EXIT.
           EXIT.
       T110-END-OF-JOB.
           EXEC CICS RETURN
               END-EXEC.
           GOBACK.

020800*****************************************************************
020900*  THIS ROUTINE WILL FORMAT A BINARY BYTE (EIGHT BITS) INTO     *
021000*  EIGHT BYTES WITH THE BIT ON AND OFF REPRESENTATION IN EACH   *
021100*  BYTE.  THE BINARY BYTE IS PUT INTO FIELD WORK-CHAR AND THE   *
021200*  EIGHT BYTES ARE RETURNED IN FIELD EXPAND-BYTE.  THE FOUR     *
021300*  BYTE FIELDS WORK-BINARY ARE USED HEAVILY IN THIS ROUTINE     *
021400*****************************************************************
021500 EXPAND-BITS.
021600     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO BINARY-WORK.
021700     MOVE WORK-CHAR TO BINARY-ONE.
021800     COMPUTE WORK-BIT-EXPAND = WORK-BINARY.
021900     MOVE ALL ZERO TO EXPAND-BYTE.
022000     SUBTRACT 128 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
022100     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
022200         MOVE '0' TO BIT-ZERO
022300         ADD 128 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
022400       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-ZERO.
022500     SUBTRACT 064 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
022600     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
022700         MOVE '0' TO BIT-ONE
022800         ADD 064 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
022900       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-ONE.
023000     SUBTRACT 032 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
023100     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
023200         MOVE '0' TO BIT-TWO
023300         ADD 032 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
023400       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-TWO.
023500     SUBTRACT 016 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
023600     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
023700         MOVE '0' TO BIT-THREE
023800         ADD 016 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
023900       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-THREE.
024000     SUBTRACT 008 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
024100     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
024200         MOVE '0' TO BIT-FOUR
024300         ADD 008 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
024400       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-FOUR.
024500     SUBTRACT 004 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
024600     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
024700         MOVE '0' TO BIT-FIVE
024800         ADD 004 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
024900       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-FIVE.
025000     SUBTRACT 002 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
025100     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
025200         MOVE '0' TO BIT-SIX
025300         ADD 002 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
025400       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-SIX.
025500     SUBTRACT 001 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
025600     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
025700         MOVE '0' TO BIT-SEVEN
025800         ADD 001 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
025900       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-SEVEN.
026000 SELECT-RECORDS SECTION.
026100     OPEN INPUT SMF-DATA.
026200 READ-FILE.
026300     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO SMF-RECORD.
026400     READ SMF-DATA AT END
026500         GO TO END-SELECT.
026510     MOVE SMF-RECORD-A TO SMF-RECORD.
026600     MOVE REC-TYPE TO WORK-CHAR.
026700     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO BINARY-WORK.
026800     MOVE WORK-CHAR TO BINARY-ONE.
026900     COMPUTE WORK-BIT-EXPAND = WORK-BINARY.
027000     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND NOT = 4
027100         GO TO READ-FILE.
027200     MOVE SMF-DATA-REC TO SMF-TYPE4.
027300     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO WORK-ARRAY-ONE.
027400     MOVE SMF-DATA-REC TO WORK-ARRAY-ONE.
027500     SET A1 TO SMF4RLCT.
027600     MOVE ZERO TO X.
027700     SET A2 TO X.
027800     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO WORK-ARRAY-TWO.
027900 RELOC-LOOP.
028000     SET A1 UP BY 1.
028100     SET A2 UP BY 1.
028200     IF A2 > 94
028300         GO TO END-RELOC-LOOP.
028400     MOVE CHAR-ONE (A1) TO CHAR-TWO (A2).
028500     GO TO RELOC-LOOP.
028600 END-RELOC-LOOP.
028700     MOVE WORK-ARRAY-TWO TO SMF4-RELOCATE.
028800     MOVE REC-DATE TO SMF-DATE.
028900     MOVE REC-TIME TO SMF-TIME.
029000     RELEASE SORT-RECORD.
029100     GO TO READ-FILE.
029200 END-SELECT.
029300     CLOSE SMF-DATA.
029400 END-SELECT-EXIT.
029500     EXIT.
029600 PRINT-REPORT SECTION.
029700     OPEN OUTPUT REPORT-OUT.
029800     MOVE 'SMFLIST ' TO HEAD-PROGRAM.
029900     MOVE 'SYSTEM MEASUREMENT FACILITY -- PROGRAMS RUN'
030000         TO HEAD-SYS-DESC.
030100     MOVE 'AS GIVEN ON DATA FILE' TO HEAD-SEQ.
030200     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC14, HEAD-DATE.
030300     PERFORM PRINT-HEADINGS-ROUTINE THROUGH PRINT-EXIT.
030400     GO TO GET-SMF-DATA.
030500 PRINT-HEADINGS-ROUTINE.
030510     ADD 1 TO PAGE-CNT
030520     MOVE PAGE-CNT TO HEAD-PAGE.
030530     MOVE HEAD-1 TO PRINT-LINE.
030540     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING TO-CHAN-1.
030550     MOVE HEAD-2 TO PRINT-LINE.
030560     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
030570     MOVE HEAD-3 TO PRINT-LINE.
030580     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
030590     MOVE HEAD-4 TO PRINT-LINE.
030591     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 2 LINES.
030592     MOVE HEAD-5 TO PRINT-LINE.
030593     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
030594     MOVE SPACE TO PRINT-LINE.
030595     MOVE ZERO TO LINE-COUNT.
030596 PRINT-1.
030597     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
030598     ADD 1 TO LINE-COUNT.
030599     IF LINE-COUNT > 56
030600         PERFORM PRINT-HEADINGS-ROUTINE.
030601 PRINT-EXIT.
030602     EXIT.
030610 GET-SMF-DATA.
030700     RETURN SMF-REC-TYPE4 AT END
030800         GO TO FINISH-REPORT.
030900     MOVE SPACE TO DETAIL-LINE.
031000     MOVE SMF4JBN TO D-JOB-NAME.
031100     MOVE SMF4STMN TO D-STEP-NAME.
031200     MOVE SMF4PGMN TO D-PROG-NAME.
031300     DIVIDE SMF-TIME BY 100 GIVING X.
031400     DIVIDE X BY 3600 GIVING D-HH
031500         REMAINDER Y.
031600     DIVIDE Y BY 60 GIVING D-MM
031700         REMAINDER D-SS.
031800     MOVE D-TIME TO D-END-TIME.
031900*    MOVE SMF-DATE TO WORK-JUL.
031910     MOVE SMF-DATE TO WORK-JUL1.
032000*    CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC10, WORK-JUL D-END-DATE.
032010     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC16, WORK-JUL1 D-END-DATE.
032100     DIVIDE SMF4SIT BY 100 GIVING X.
032200     DIVIDE X BY 3600 GIVING D-HH
032300         REMAINDER Y.
032400     DIVIDE Y BY 60 GIVING D-MM
032500         REMAINDER D-SS.
032600     MOVE D-TIME TO D-START-TIME.
032700*    MOVE SMF4STID TO WORK-JUL.
032710     MOVE SMF4STID TO WORK-JUL2.
032800*    CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC10, WORK-JUL D-START-DATE.
032810     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC16, WORK-JUL2 D-START-DATE.
032811     MOVE ZERO TO DAY-DIFF.
032820     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING DAY-DIFF, WORK-JUL2 WORK-JUL1.
032900*    IF SMF4SIT > SMF-TIME
033000*        ADD 8640000 TO SMF-TIME.
033101     MULTIPLY DAY-DIFF BY 8640000 GIVING X.
033103     ADD SMF-TIME TO X.
033110     SUBTRACT SMF4SIT FROM X GIVING Z.
033120*    SUBTRACT SMF-TIME FROM SMF4SIT GIVING Z.
033200     DIVIDE Z BY 100 GIVING X.
033300     DIVIDE X BY 3600 GIVING D-HH
033400         REMAINDER Y.
033500     DIVIDE Y BY 60 GIVING D-MM
033600         REMAINDER D-SS.
033700     MOVE D-TIME TO D-DUR-TIME.
033800     MOVE DETAIL-LINE TO P-LINE.
033900     PERFORM PRINT-1 THROUGH PRINT-EXIT.
034000     GO TO GET-SMF-DATA.
034100 FINISH-REPORT.
034200     CLOSE REPORT-OUT.
034300 PRINT-REPORT-EXIT.
034400     EXIT.

021300     GOBACK.
021400*****************************************************************
021500*  THIS ROUTINE WILL FORMAT A BINARY BYTE (EIGHT BITS) INTO     *
021600*  EIGHT BYTES WITH THE BIT ON AND OFF REPRESENTATION IN EACH   *
021700*  BYTE.  THE BINARY BYTE IS PUT INTO FIELD WORK-CHAR AND THE   *
021800*  EIGHT BYTES ARE RETURNED IN FIELD EXPAND-BYTE.  THE FOUR     *
021900*  BYTE FIELDS WORK-BINARY ARE USED HEAVILY IN THIS ROUTINE     *
022000*****************************************************************
022100 EXPAND-BITS SECTION.
022200     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO BINARY-WORK.
022300     MOVE WORK-CHAR TO BINARY-ONE.
022400     COMPUTE WORK-BIT-EXPAND = WORK-BINARY.
022500     MOVE ALL ZERO TO EXPAND-BYTE.
022600     SUBTRACT 128 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
022700     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
022800         MOVE '0' TO BIT-ZERO
022900         ADD 128 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
023000       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-ZERO.
023100     SUBTRACT 064 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
023200     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
023300         MOVE '0' TO BIT-ONE
023400         ADD 064 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
023500       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-ONE.
023600     SUBTRACT 032 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
023700     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
023800         MOVE '0' TO BIT-TWO
023900         ADD 032 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
024000       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-TWO.
024100     SUBTRACT 016 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
024200     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
024300         MOVE '0' TO BIT-THREE
024400         ADD 016 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
024500       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-THREE.

034600         REMAINDER D-SS.
034700     MOVE D-TIME TO D-END-TIME.
034800     MOVE SMF-DATE TO WORK-JUL.
034900     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC34, WORK-JUL D-END-DATE.
035000     DIVIDE SMF6WST BY 100 GIVING X.

035200         REMAINDER Y.
035300     DIVIDE Y BY 60 GIVING D-MM
035400         REMAINDER D-SS.
035500     MOVE D-TIME TO D-START-TIME.
035600     MOVE SMF6WSD TO WORK-JUL.
035700     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC34, WORK-JUL D-START-DATE.
035800     IF SMF6WST > SMF-TIME
035900         ADD 8640000 TO SMF-TIME.
036000     SUBTRACT SMF-TIME FROM SMF6WST GIVING Z.
036100     DIVIDE Z BY 100 GIVING X.
036200     DIVIDE X BY 3600 GIVING D-HH
036300         REMAINDER Y.
036400     DIVIDE Y BY 60 GIVING D-MM
036500         REMAINDER D-SS.
036600     MOVE D-TIME TO D-DUR-TIME.

036900     GO TO GET-SMF-DATA.
037000 FINISH-REPORT.
037100     CLOSE REPORT-OUT.
037200 PRINT-REPORT-EXIT.
037300     EXIT.

030200 PROCEDURE DIVISION.
030300     OPEN INPUT  PARMIN.
030810     MOVE  0  TO NBR-RECORDS-READ.
030900     MOVE 'SMFLIST ' TO HEAD-PROGRAM.
031000     MOVE 'SYSTEM MEASUREMENT FACILITY -- SEQUENTIAL FILES'
031100         TO HEAD-SYS-DESC.
031200     MOVE 'AS GIVEN ON DATA FILE' TO HEAD-SEQ.
031300     CALL 'G207DCAN' USING G207-FUNC01, HEAD-DATE.
031310     MOVE 'Y' TO PROCESS-ALL.
031400 PROCESS-PARMS.
031500*************************************************************
031600*  READ A PARAMETER CARD (IF THERE ARE ANY).                *
031700*************************************************************
031800     READ PARMIN AT END
031900         GO TO CHK-PARM-COUNT.
032000     ADD 1 TO NBR-RECORDS-READ.
032010     MOVE 'N' TO PROCESS-ALL.
032100     IF PARM-TYPE = 'ED'
032200         GO TO LOAD-ED.
032300     IF PARM-TYPE = 'ID'
032400         GO TO LOAD-ID.
032500     IF PARM-TYPE = 'EJ'
032600         GO TO LOAD-EJ.
032700     IF PARM-TYPE = 'IJ'
032800         GO TO LOAD-IJ.
032900     IF PARM-TYPE = 'EU'
033000         GO TO LOAD-EU.
033100     IF PARM-TYPE = 'IU'

033300     IF PARM-TYPE = 'EV'

033500     IF PARM-TYPE = 'IV'

033700     GO TO CHECK-PARM-NV.

034800*************************************************************
034900*  LOAD A EXCLUDE DATASET RECORD                            *
035000*************************************************************
035100     ADD 1 TO ED-SUB.
035200     IF ED-SUB > 100
035300         DISPLAY 'MORE THAN 100 TYPE ED PARAMETER CARDS'
035400         DISPLAY 'PARAMETER CARD NOT PROCESSED         '
035500         DISPLAY PARM-RECORD
035600         MOVE 999 TO AB-CODE
035700         CALL 'ILBOABN0' USING AB-CODE.
035800     MOVE ZERO TO X.
035900     MOVE PARM-DSN TO ED-DSN (ED-SUB).
036000 FIND-ED-MASK-LOOP.
036100     ADD 1 TO X.
036200     IF X > 44
036300         GO TO END-ED-MASK-LOOP.
036400     IF PARM-CHAR (X) = SPACE
036500         GO TO END-ED-MASK-LOOP.
036600     IF PARM-CHAR (X) NOT = '*'
036700         GO TO FIND-ED-MASK-LOOP.
036800     MOVE 'Y' TO ED-MASK (ED-SUB).
037000     MOVE X TO ED-LN (ED-SUB).
037100     DISPLAY 'DSN MASK : ' ED-DSN (ED-SUB) ' TO BE BYPASSED'.
037200     GO TO PROCESS-PARMS.
037300 END-ED-MASK-LOOP.
037400     SUBTRACT 1 FROM X.
037500     MOVE X TO ED-LN (ED-SUB).
037600     DISPLAY 'DSN      : ' ED-DSN (ED-SUB) ' TO BE BYPASSED'.
037700     GO TO PROCESS-PARMS.

045130 PRINT-HEADINGS-ROUTINE.

045400     MOVE HEAD-1 TO PRINT-LINE.
045500     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING TO-CHAN-1.
045600     MOVE HEAD-2 TO PRINT-LINE.
045700     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
045800     MOVE HEAD-3 TO PRINT-LINE.
045900     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
046000     MOVE HEAD-4 TO PRINT-LINE.
046100     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 2 LINES.
046200     MOVE HEAD-5 TO PRINT-LINE.
046300     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.
046400     MOVE SPACE TO PRINT-LINE.
046500     MOVE ZERO TO LINE-COUNT.
046600 PRINT-1.
046700     WRITE PRINT-LINE AFTER ADVANCING 1 LINES.

046900     IF LINE-COUNT > 54
047000         PERFORM PRINT-HEADINGS-ROUTINE.

047210*************************************************************
047220*  CHK FOR EXCLUDE OR INCLUDE                               *
047230*************************************************************
047240 CHECK-FIELD.
047250     MOVE 'N' TO CONT.
047260     IF CHK-MASK NOT = 'Y'
047270         AND CHK-FLD = WORK-VALUE
047280         MOVE 'Y' TO CONT
047290         GO TO CHK-FLD-EXIT.
047291     MOVE ZERO TO X.
047292 CHK-CHAR-LOOP.
047293     ADD 1 TO X.
047294     IF X > CHK-LN
047295         GO TO CHK-FLD-EXIT.
047296     IF X > 44
047297         GO TO CHK-FLD-EXIT.
047298     IF WK-CHAR (X) NOT = CHK-CHAR (X)
047299       AND CHK-CHAR(X) NOT = '*'
047300         GO TO CHK-FLD-EXIT.
047301     IF CHK-CHAR (X) = '*'
047302         MOVE 'Y' TO CONT
047303         GO TO CHK-FLD-EXIT.
047304     GO TO CHK-CHAR-LOOP.
047305 CHK-FLD-EXIT.
047306     EXIT.
047307*****************************************************************
047308*  THIS ROUTINE WILL FORMAT A BINARY BYTE (EIGHT BITS) INTO     *
047309*  EIGHT BYTES WITH THE BIT ON AND OFF REPRESENTATION IN EACH   *
047310*  BYTE.  THE BINARY BYTE IS PUT INTO FIELD WORK-CHAR AND THE   *
047311*  EIGHT BYTES ARE RETURNED IN FIELD EXPAND-BYTE.  THE FOUR     *
047312*  BYTE FIELDS WORK-BINARY ARE USED HEAVILY IN THIS ROUTINE     *
047313*****************************************************************
047314 EXPAND-BITS.
047315     MOVE LOW-VALUES TO BINARY-WORK.
047316     MOVE WORK-CHAR TO BINARY-ONE.
047317     COMPUTE WORK-BIT-EXPAND = WORK-BINARY.
047318     MOVE ALL ZERO TO EXPAND-BYTE.
047319     SUBTRACT 128 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047320     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047321         MOVE '0' TO BIT-ZERO
047322         ADD 128 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047323       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-ZERO.
047324     SUBTRACT 064 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047325     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047326         MOVE '0' TO BIT-ONE
047327         ADD 064 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047328       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-ONE.
047329     SUBTRACT 032 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047330     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047331         MOVE '0' TO BIT-TWO
047332         ADD 032 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047333       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-TWO.
047334     SUBTRACT 016 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047335     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047336         MOVE '0' TO BIT-THREE
047337         ADD 016 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047338       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-THREE.
047339     SUBTRACT 008 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047340     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047341         MOVE '0' TO BIT-FOUR
047342         ADD 008 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047343       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-FOUR.
047344     SUBTRACT 004 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047345     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047346         MOVE '0' TO BIT-FIVE
047347         ADD 004 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047348       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-FIVE.
047349     SUBTRACT 002 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047350     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047351         MOVE '0' TO BIT-SIX
047352         ADD 002 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047353       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-SIX.
047354     SUBTRACT 001 FROM WORK-BIT-EXPAND.
047355     IF WORK-BIT-EXPAND LESS THAN ZERO
047356         MOVE '0' TO BIT-SEVEN
047357         ADD 001 TO WORK-BIT-EXPAND
047358       ELSE MOVE '1' TO BIT-SEVEN.

026600 01  EXPAND-BYTE.
026700     02  BIT-ZERO                PIC X.
026800     02  BIT-ONE                 PIC X.

027000     02  BIT-THREE               PIC X.

027300     02  BIT-SIX                 PIC X.
027400     02  BIT-SEVEN               PIC X.
027500 01  WORK-ARRAY-ONE.
